meanings.definition: A dairy product made from the bacterial fermentation of milk.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy having yoghourts with breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: She bought a variety of yoghourts from the store.
meanings.sent3: The yoghourts in the fridge were having a party with the cheese.
meanings.sent4: The creamy yoghourts were like a soothing balm for her upset stomach.
meanings.sent5: The tangy taste of the yoghourts lingered on his tongue.

meanings.definition: The act of consuming yoghourts for their health benefits.
meanings.sent1: Yoghourts can be a great addition to your diet for better digestion.
meanings.sent2: Many people practice yoghourts for a healthier gut.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her love for yoghourts was her secret superpower.
meanings.sent4: The daily ritual of eating yoghourts was like a health boost for her.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of yoghourts were evident in her glowing skin.
